Summary: Felix curses his biology and the world for how it is, for how it's evolved. Curses the god that decided submission and dominance needed to be biological. entry.title: Ours to Enjoy
entry.summary:
Author: Nymphare

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,708Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 176

Summary: With the cup empty and only the faint traces of white powder at the bottom, Chan wriggles free from Felix’s grasp and gets out of bed. He walks into the bathroom to rinse the cups, making sure that he doesn’t look at his own reflection. Too afraid of seeing the devil staring back at him. When he walks back into the bedroom, his heart starts thudding against his chest. Splayed out on the bed, with his hair all tousled, is Felix. His oversized hoodie is pulled only slightly, revealing an inviting sliver of warm skin. "Felix? Are you awake?"

entry.title: A Pocket of Time
entry.summary:
Author: heavylead

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,987Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 89

Summary: It’s the Bang family crest. Jisung doesn’t see it often in their city, the Lees’ snake crawling about instead. Popping up in the newspapers, nesting in business signs, curled around the rifles of policemen. Peace reigned long before he was born, but he’s heard the stories. The wolf who stormed their city, and the snake who sank its fangs into its neck.The snake may have injected the wolf with its venom, but the wolf turned out to be immune. The snake retreated in on itself, and the wolf grew fatter. Their nation shrunk away in the treaty, a middle chunk of lumber-dense land acceded to the wolf as a compromise for peace. They crossed through that land, during their journey here. Jisung didn’t see it, pondering the shine on Minho’s shoes./Minho is invited to spend the summer with his old classmate and friend, Chan. Jisung is his submissive, so naturally he's dragged along.

Author: mxrshere

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,615Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 78

Summary: Chan sets out fresh clothes for Felix after changing his own, then kisses him on the head and leaves downstairs to start a kettle and soak Felix’s dirty clothes. Felix takes his time washing up, but Chan doesn’t mind waiting as it yields him more time to work the blood stains out of the white fabric. He wishes he would have swayed him into wearing a black outfit, or at least his cloak to preserve his clothes, but he also didn’t anticipate Felix to have had such a seemingly feral reaction to the mere taste of blood— or maybe Chan had grown far too used to it to understand.OrVampire fledgling Felix gets a taste of human blood for the very first time.
